duties_responsibilities.duty: Plans and oversees the development of voice/collaboration platforms, enterprise voice and video architecture and strategy, and modernization of cloud technology networks.
Develops the strategic IT plan for voice and video services delivery, investment roadmap for future voice services, and translates business plans into requirements.
Defines and maintains all voice and video service’s key performance indicator (KPI) metrics, manages access, security, continuity, and maintenance of all services.
Participates in disaster recovery infrastructure planning, building, and testing, and defines and delivers continuous improvement plans and programs.
Works collaboratively with IT leaders on strategic network services initiatives, participates in discussions with vendors, and serves as a technical mentor for staff.
Communicates architecture decisions, roadblocks, and timelines to stakeholders, and complies with all policies and standards.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in a quantitative or business field (e.g., statistics, mathematics, engineering, computer science) and 5 – 7 years of related experience.
